item.description: 2022-05b ItÂ´s us again! Today we have a small API Fix Update which focus mainly on the UI. As some of you reported the API Calls for Domains/Mailboxes donÂ´t work anymore if there is no Tag set. This is now fixed. Additionaly, weÂ´ve added a small tweak for the UI. Did you know that there was a little plus symbol at the left of a Domain/Mailbox? No? DonÂ´t worry it was a little hard to see… until now :)
